Title: Cohort Tier Architecture
Description:
$500, $1,500, $5,000/month tiers with differential entitlements.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- SLA table published
- Entitlements enforced in gate
- Audit of access controls passed
- Upgrade/downgrade logic tested

Title: Insight Packaging Design
Description:
Weekly/biweekly drop templates with alert formats.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Templates approved by stakeholders
- Version stamps implemented
- Delivery analytics > 70% open
- Revision policy documented

Title: Delivery Cadence Configuration
Description:
Schedule setup for insight drops across tiers.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Cron jobs configured
- Tier-specific timing honored
- Timezone handling correct
- Manual override available

Title: Renewal Reminder Sequence
Description:
30/7/1 day reminders with grace periods.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Email templates approved
- Timing accurate to SLA
- Grace period logic working
- Downgrade offers integrated

Title: Churn Rescue Flows
Description:
Downgrade offers and win-back campaigns.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Downgrade path tested
- Win-back sequence configured
- Churn reason codes captured
- Analytics dashboard live

Title: Member Feedback System
Description:
Structured surveys with NPS and anomaly detection.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Survey templates deployed
- NPS tracking live
- Anomaly pipeline operational
- Response SLA met

Title: Claims Governance Framework
Description:
Every claim linked to evidence artifact.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Claims database created
- Evidence links mandatory
- Review workflow defined
- Publish blocked without approval

Title: Drop Scheduler Automation
Description:
Content assembly, multi-channel delivery, logging.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Scheduler runs on cadence
- Multi-channel (email/Slack/app) working
- Logs to Linear with coverage stats
- Retry on delivery failures

Title: Entitlement Gate System
Description:
Tier-based access rules with audit reports.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Access correctly gated per tier
- Upgrades instant
- Downgrades respect grace period
- Monthly audit reports generated

Title: Renewal/Dunning Workflow Automation
Description:
Auto-reminders, payment retries, human escalation.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Reminders sent per schedule
- 3 payment retries with backoff
- Human escalation on final fail
- Success/fail logged

Title: Feedback Ingestion Pipeline
Description:
Survey parsing, topic clustering, auto-improvement tasks.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Surveys parsed automatically
- Topics clustered for analysis
- Tasks created prioritized by ARR impact
- Weekly summary to Linear

Title: Claims Checker Automation
Description:
Regex + rule engine for claim validation.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All claims scanned before publish
- Overreach flagged automatically
- Evidence links required
- Bypass requires approval + log
